Row.Text: The Loathly Lady

Tonight, a hideous woman has entered your castle's keep in an attempt to escape the torrential rain outside. None of your soldiers garrisonned inside have complied with her shrill requests for a blanket. She has brazenly come to you and demanded a blanket to keep her warm for the night.[NEWLINE]
Have her evicted from the castle.
Very well, she may use my blanket.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_GAPoints} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_GAPoints} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a Waterfront Mansion in {2_CityName}, which grants +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism
You have spurned the Loathly Lady and had her removed from the castle. Your men seemed to have agreed with the decision.

After granting the Loathly Lady her request, you awoke the next morning to find that she had become a beautiful woman. Not only that, but she has granted you a luxurious home overlooking the sea -- one of your greatest desires. The only downside is that your men don't seem to believe that the Loathly Lady and the beautiful woman are the same person, and rumors abound of your relationship with such a hideous creature.
{1_LeaderName}'s Confession

Relations between {1_PlayerCiv} and {2_EnemyCiv} have improved greatly due to your Declaration of Friendship, but it seems that the most profound effect has been on {3_LeaderName} herself. Due to the influence of your Love Spot, she has declared that she loves you and wishes for your hand in marriage, and it doesn't seem like she'll take "no" for an answer.[NEWLINE]
Spurn her.
Accept her feelings.
